alert.note: Alert for Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hudspeth County through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Guadalupe Mountains National Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to outdoor objects and vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Guadalupe Mountains National Park, Far Western Portions of Guadalupe Mountains National Park and Gypsum Dunes at Guadalupe National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
